text:
Jonah Hex is a 2010 American western supernatural thriller film based on the DC Comics antihero of the same name. Directed by Jimmy Hayward at his live-action directorial debut, the film stars Josh Brolin as the title character and also stars John Malkovich, Megan Fox, Michael Fassbender, Will Arnett, Michael Shannon and Wes Bentley.
Produced by Legendary Pictures, DC Entertainment and Weed Road Pictures, the film was released by Warner Bros. Pictures on June 18, 2010 and was a major critical and commercial failure grossing only $10 million against a budget of $47 million.
